name: Circles of hell
description: Circles of hell - a cooperative platformer for lovers of complexities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/10 (32- or 64-bit) Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/10 (32- or 64-bit) Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
